## ColorLCH.roundToPrecision() method

Returns a new [ColorLCH](./fast-colors.colorlch.md) rounded to the provided precision

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
roundToPrecision(precision: number): ColorLCH;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  precision | number | the precision to round to |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ColorLCH](./fast-colors.colorlch.md)
